title: San Jose Studio, Upscale interiors, WOW kitchen, Vintage 1930s details
posting_body: Walk to theaters, fine restaurants, great Italian food, coffee shops, a vegan restaurant, nightclubs, a grocery store & deli, a drug store, museums and much more — all within two blocks!
Light rail and bus stops are just steps away.
Let the St. Claire Luxury Loft apartments be your San Jose apartment.
This apartment features:
This STUDIO is has upscale interiors, luxury finishes and style!
Great views
17+ foot ceilings and exposed brick walls
Restored 1930’s architectural details including original doors & hardware
Deluxe kitchens with stainless appliances, including microwave, dishwasher, and disposal
Convenient full-size washer and dryer inside
Spacious closet in hallway and extra storage locker available
Come Visit us!
St Claire Apartments
311 S First St
San Jose, CA 95113
